title: Gnome Remote Desktop (Fedora 40 Workstation)
author: r-w-frederick
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Attempt to connect to remote Gnome Remote Desktop (Fedora 40 Workstation) with RDP protocol from Windows client.
Expect behavior similar to remote connection to Windows via RDP, and remote Linux hosts via RDP/XRPD.

## Current Behavior
Supplying Username & Password leads to error.
Error code: 0x0
Extended error code: 0x0

Remove UN/PW from mRemoteNG config pops Windows Security dialog.  Supply correct UN/PW.
